mapper.delete:
update zj_tz_inv_xmtzqk set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and id in
#{model.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT t3.id, t4.project_id AS proId, t4.pro_no AS pro_num, t4.company_name AS comname, t4.project_name AS pro_name, t3.create_date, t3.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage t4 INNER JOIN pro_inv_basic t1 ON t1.project_id = t4.project_id INNER JOIN pro_inv_com_inf t2 ON t2.inv_pro_id = t1.id INNER JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk t3 ON t3.inv_pro_id = t1.id
t4.del_flag = '0'
and t4.project_id = #{projectId}
and t4.project_id in (${projectIdSql})
ORDER BY t3.period_value DESC

SELECT t3.project_id, t3.pro_no AS pro_num, t3.project_name AS pro_name, t3.project_short_name AS short_name, (SELECT szgq FROM pro_inv_com_inf tb1 INNER JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id) AS gqbl, t3.company_name AS comname,
(SELECT TRUNCATE((tzwc1+tzwc2+tzwc3+tzwc4)*szgq/100/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.xmid and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0'
tb1.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) and
tb1.bbh = '2' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id
)AS bnjhwcqytz, (SELECT TRUNCATE(yjgjtwcjaxj/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.xmid and tb2.del_flag = '0'
tb1.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) and
tb1.bbh = '2' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id
) AS ygjbnjhwcja,
(SELECT TRUNCATE(IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(tb1.qytzwcbq,0)),0)/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0'
tb1.del_flag = '0' and
SUBSTR(tb1.period_value,1,4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) AND
tb2.project_id = t3.project_id
) AS qytzwcbn, (SELECT TRUNCATE( IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(tb1.ygjjtwcjafbq,0)),0)/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0'
tb1.del_flag = '0' and
SUBSTR(tb1.period_value,1,4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) AND
tb2.project_id = t3.project_id
) AS ygjjtwcjafbn, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(tb1.qytzwcbq,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0'
tb1.del_flag = '0' and
SUBSTR(tb1.period_value,1,4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) AND
tb2.project_id = t3.project_id
) /(SELECT (tzwc1+tzwc2+tzwc3+tzwc4)*szgq/100 FROM pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.xmid and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0'
tb1.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) and
tb1.bbh = '2' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id
) AS bnqytzbfb, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(tb1.ygjjtwcjafbq,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0'
tb1.del_flag = '0' and
SUBSTR(tb1.period_value,1,4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) AND
tb2.project_id = t3.project_id
) /(SELECT yjgjtwcjaxj FROM pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.xmid and tb2.del_flag = '0'
tb1.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) AND
tb1.bbh = '2' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id
) AS bnjjafbfb,
(SELECT (SUM( t.tzwcbq ) * t.szgq / 100)/ (IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0)* t.szgq / 100) ((IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc2,0))* t.szgq / 100) ((IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc2,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc3,0) )* t.szgq / 100) FROM (SELECT tb1.project_id, tb1.project_short_name, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1, tb5.tzwc1,tb5.tzwc2, tb5.tzwc1,tb5.tzwc2,tb5.tzwc3, QUARTER ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y%m' ) ) AS jidu, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
and tb5.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' ) AS t
t.project_id = t3.project_id
AND t.n = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
AND t.jidu <= CAST(#{quarter} AS SIGNED) - 1
) AS bjqytzbfb,
(SELECT SUM( t.ygjjtwcjafbq )/ IFNULL(t.yjgjtwcja1,0) (IFNULL(t.yjgjtwcja1,0) + IFNULL(t.yjgjtwcja2,0)) (IFNULL(t.yjgjtwcja1,0) + IFNULL(t.yjgjtwcja2,0) + IFNULL(t.yjgjtwcja3,0) ) FROM (SELECT tb1.project_id, tb1.project_short_name, tb3.ygjjtwcjafbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.yjgjtwcja1, tb5.yjgjtwcja1,tb5.yjgjtwcja2, tb5.yjgjtwcja1,tb5.yjgjtwcja2,tb5.yjgjtwcja3, QUARTER ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y%m' ) ) AS jidu, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
and tb5.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' ) AS t
t.project_id = t3.project_id
AND t.n = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
AND t.jidu <= CAST(#{quarter} AS SIGNED) - 1
) AS bjjjafbfb,
(SELECT SUM( t.tzwcbq )/ IFNULL(t.tzwcxj,0) FROM (SELECT tb1.project_id, tb1.project_short_name, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1 + tb5.tzwc2 + tb5.tzwc3 + tb5.tzwc4 AS tzwcxj, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
and tb5.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' ) AS t
t.project_id = t3.project_id
AND t.n = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
) AS snztzbfb,
t3.pro_process_id FROM zj_tz_pro_manage t3
t3.del_flag = '0' and t3.project_type = '0' and (t3.pro_process_id = '2' or t3.pro_process_id = '3' or t3.pro_process_id = '4')
and t3.project_id = #{projectId}
and t3.project_id in (${projectIdSql})
and t3.company_name = #{comname}
and (SELECT (SUM( t.tzwcbq ) * t.szgq / 100)/ (IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0)* t.szgq / 100) ( ((IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc2,0))* t.szgq / 100) ((IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc2,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc3,0) )* t.szgq / 100) FROM (SELECT tb1.project_id, tb1.project_short_name, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1, tb5.tzwc1,tb5.tzwc2, tb5.tzwc1,tb5.tzwc2,tb5.tzwc3, QUARTER ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y%m' ) ) AS jidu, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
and tb5.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' ) AS t
t.project_id = t3.project_id
AND t.n = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
AND t.jidu <= CAST(#{quarter} AS SIGNED) - 1
) < 0.7 and (SELECT SUM( t.tzwcbq )/ IFNULL(t.tzwcxj,0) FROM (SELECT tb1.project_id, tb1.project_short_name, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1 + tb5.tzwc2 + tb5.tzwc3 + tb5.tzwc4 AS tzwcxj, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
and tb5.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' ) AS t
t.project_id = t3.project_id
AND t.n = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
) >= 0.6
and (SELECT SUM( t.tzwcbq )/ IFNULL(t.tzwcxj,0) FROM (SELECT tb1.project_id, tb1.project_short_name, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1 + tb5.tzwc2 + tb5.tzwc3 + tb5.tzwc4 AS tzwcxj, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
and tb5.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' ) AS t
t.project_id = t3.project_id
AND t.n = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
) < 0.6
ORDER BY CAST( t3.sort1 AS DECIMAL ),t3.pro_no
ORDER BY bnjhwcqytz
ORDER BY bnjhwcqytz DESC
ORDER BY ygjbnjhwcja
ORDER BY ygjbnjhwcja DESC
ORDER BY qytzwcbn
ORDER BY qytzwcbn DESC
ORDER BY ygjjtwcjafbn
ORDER BY ygjjtwcjafbn DESC
ORDER BY bnqytzbfb
ORDER BY bnqytzbfb DESC
ORDER BY bnjjafbfb
ORDER BY bnjjafbfb DESC
ORDER BY bjqytzbfb
ORDER BY bjqytzbfb DESC
ORDER BY bjjjafbfb
ORDER BY bjjjafbfb DESC

if.test: quarter != null and quarter != '' and quarter == '1'.toString()

if.if:
SELECT p.sjqytzpm FROM ( SELECT t.project_id, (SUM( t.tzwcbq ) * t.szgq / 100) / (t.tzwcxj * t.szgq / 100) AS snqytzbfb, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY (SUM( IFNULL(t.tzwcbq,0) ) * IFNULL(t.szgq,0) / 100 )/ (t.tzwcxj * t.szgq / 100) DESC) AS sjqytzpm FROM ( SELECT tb1.project_id, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1+tb5.tzwc2+tb5.tzwc3+tb5.tzwc4 AS tzwcxj, QUARTER ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y%m' ) ) AS jidu, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' AND (tb1.pro_process_id = '2' or tb1.pro_process_id = '3' or tb1.pro_process_id = '4')
) AS t
AND t.n = CAST(#{periodValue} AS SIGNED) - 1
AND t.period_value = CAST(#{periodValue} AS SIGNED) - 1
GROUP BY t.project_id ORDER BY snqytzbfb DESC ) AS p
p.project_id = #{projectId}

if.test: quarter != null and quarter != '' and quarter != '1'.toString()
quarter != null and quarter != '' and quarter == '1'.toString()

if.if:
SELECT p.sjjjafpm FROM ( SELECT t.project_id, SUM( t.ygjjtwcjafbq ) / t.yjgjtwcjaxj AS snjjafbfb, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM( t.ygjjtwcjafbq )/ t.yjgjtwcjaxj DESC) AS sjjjafpm FROM ( SELECT tb1.project_id, tb3.ygjjtwcjafbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.yjgjtwcjaxj, QUARTER ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y%m' ) ) AS jidu, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' AND (tb1.pro_process_id = '2' or tb1.pro_process_id = '3' or tb1.pro_process_id = '4')
) AS t
AND t.n = CAST(#{periodValue} AS SIGNED) - 1
AND t.period_value = CAST(#{periodValue} AS SIGNED) - 1
GROUP BY t.project_id ORDER BY snjjafbfb DESC ) AS p
p.project_id = #{projectId}

if.test: quarter != null and quarter != '' and quarter != '1'.toString()

mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(IFNULL(amount1,0)) as zht, SUM(IFNULL(amount3,0)) as zja FROM zj_tz_pro_manage
del_flag = '0' and project_type = '0'
AND zj_tz_pro_manage.project_id = #{projectId}
AND zj_tz_pro_manage.project_id in (${projectIdSql})

SELECT area_name, COUNT( project_id ) AS count FROM zj_tz_pro_manage t2
t2.del_flag = '0' and t2.project_type = '0'
AND t2.project_id = #{projectId}
AND t2.project_id in (${projectIdSql})
GROUP BY area_name

SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM( tzwcbq )/10000,2) AS tzwckl, TRUNCATE(SUM( wcjafbq )/10000,2) AS wcjafkl, area_name, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1
tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb1.project_type = '0'
and tb1.area_name LIKE concat('%', #{areaName}, '%')
and tb1.project_id in (${projectIdSql})
) AS invCount FROM zj_tz_pro_manage t1 INNER JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.project_id = t1.project_id and t2.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk t3 ON t3.inv_pro_id = t2.id and t3.del_flag = '0'
t1.del_flag = '0' and t1.project_type = '0'
and t1.area_name LIKE concat('%', #{areaName}, '%')
and t1.project_id in (${projectIdSql})

SELECT IFNULL(TRUNCATE(amount1 /10000,2),0) AS amount1,
IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(tzwcbq,0))/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' and t2.project_id = #{projectId} ),0) AS tzwckl,
IFNULL(TRUNCATE(amount1 /10000,2),0) - IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(tzwcbq,0))/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' and t2.project_id = #{projectId} ),0) AS wtzwckl,
IFNULL(TRUNCATE(amount3/10000,2),0) AS amount3,
IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(wcjafbq,0))/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' and t2.project_id = #{projectId} ),0) AS wcjafkl,
IFNULL(TRUNCATE(amount3/10000,2),0)- IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(wcjafbq,0))/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' and t2.project_id = #{projectId} ),0) AS wwcjafkl
FROM zj_tz_pro_manage t3
t3.del_flag = '0' and t3.project_type = '0'
and t3.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT tb2.project_id,
IFNULL(TRUNCATE((IFNULL(tzwc1,0)+IFNULL(tzwc2,0)+IFNULL(tzwc3,0)+IFNULL(tzwc4,0))/10000,2) ,0) AS bnjhwcztz,
IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(tzwcbq,0) )/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t3 ON t3.project_id = t2.project_id and t3.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' and t3.pro_process_id = #{param2.proProcessId} and t2.project_id = #{param2.projectId} and SUBSTR(t1.period_value,1,4) = #{param2.periodValue}),0) AS tzwcbn,
IFNULL(TRUNCATE((IFNULL(tzwc1,0)+IFNULL(tzwc2,0)+IFNULL(tzwc3,0)+IFNULL(tzwc4,0))/10000,2) ,0) - IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(tzwcbq,0) )/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t3 ON t3.project_id = t2.project_id and t3.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' and t3.pro_process_id = #{param2.proProcessId} and t2.project_id = #{param2.projectId} and SUBSTR(t1.period_value,1,4) = #{param2.periodValue}),0) AS wtzwcbn,
IFNULL(TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztjawcjaxj,0) /10000,2) ,0) AS bnjhwcjaf,
IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(wcjafbq,0) )/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t3 ON t3.project_id = t2.project_id and t3.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' and t3.pro_process_id = #{param2.proProcessId} and t2.project_id = #{param2.projectId} and SUBSTR(t1.period_value,1,4) = #{param2.periodValue}),0) AS wcjafbn,
IFNULL(TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztjawcjaxj,0) /10000,2) ,0) - IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(wcjafbq,0) )/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t3 ON t3.project_id = t2.project_id and t3.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' and t3.pro_process_id = #{param2.proProcessId} and t2.project_id = #{param2.projectId} and SUBSTR(t1.period_value,1,4) = #{param2.periodValue}),0) AS wwcjafbn,
IFNULL( TRUNCATE(IFNULL(tzwc1,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(tzwc2,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(tzwc3,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(tzwc4,0)/10000,2) ,0) AS jhwcztzbj,
IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(tzwcbq,0))/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t4 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t5 ON t5.id = t4.inv_pro_id and t5.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t6 ON t6.project_id = t5.project_id and t6.del_flag = '0' WHERE t4.del_flag = '0' and t6.pro_process_id = #{param2.proProcessId} and t5.project_id = #{param2.projectId} AND t4.period_value IN #{model} ),0) AS tzwcbj,
IFNULL( TRUNCATE(IFNULL(tzwc1,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(tzwc2,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(tzwc3,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(tzwc4,0)/10000,2) ,0) - IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(tzwcbq,0))/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t4 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t5 ON t5.id = t4.inv_pro_id and t5.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t6 ON t6.project_id = t5.project_id and t6.del_flag = '0' WHERE t4.del_flag = '0' and t6.pro_process_id = #{param2.proProcessId} and t5.project_id = #{param2.projectId} AND t4.period_value IN #{model} ),0) AS wtzwcbj,
IFNULL( TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztwcja1,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztwcja2,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztwcja3,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztwcja4,0)/10000,2) ,0) AS jhwcjafbj
,IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(wcjafbq,0))/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t4 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t5 ON t5.id = t4.inv_pro_id and t5.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t6 ON t6.project_id = t5.project_id and t6.del_flag = '0' WHERE t4.del_flag = '0' and t6.pro_process_id = #{param2.proProcessId} and t5.project_id = #{param2.projectId} AND t4.period_value IN #{model} ),0) AS wcjafbj,
IFNULL( TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztwcja1,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztwcja2,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztwcja3,0)/10000,2) TRUNCATE(IFNULL(xmztwcja4,0)/10000,2) ,0) - IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(wcjafbq,0))/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t4 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t5 ON t5.id = t4.inv_pro_id and t5.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t6 ON t6.project_id = t5.project_id and t6.del_flag = '0' WHERE t4.del_flag = '0' and t6.pro_process_id = #{param2.proProcessId} and t5.project_id = #{param2.projectId} AND t4.period_value IN #{model} ),0) AS wwcjafbj
FROM pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.xmid and tb2.del_flag = '0'
tb1.bbh = '2'
and tb2.project_id = #{param2.projectId}
and tb1.period_value = #{param2.periodValue}

if.test: quarter != null and quarter != '' and quarter == '1'.toString()

select.if:
SELECT p.sjqytzpm FROM ( SELECT t.project_id, (SUM( t.tzwcbq ) * t.szgq / 100) / ((IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc2,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc3,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc4,0)) * t.szgq / 100) AS sjqytzbfb, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY (SUM( IFNULL(t.tzwcbq,0) ) * IFNULL(t.szgq,0) / 100 )/
( (IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc2,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc3,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc4,0)) * IFNULL(t.szgq,0) / 100) DESC) AS sjqytzpm FROM ( SELECT tb1.project_id, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1,tb5.tzwc2,tb5.tzwc3,tb5.tzwc4, QUARTER ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y%m' ) ) AS jidu, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' AND (tb1.pro_process_id = '2' or tb1.pro_process_id = '3' or tb1.pro_process_id = '4') ) AS t
AND t.n = CAST(#{periodValue} AS SIGNED) - 1
AND t.jidu <= 4
AND t.period_value = CAST(#{periodValue} AS SIGNED) - 1
GROUP BY t.project_id HAVING sjqytzbfb IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sjqytzbfb DESC ) AS p
and p.project_id = #{projectId}

if.test: quarter != null and quarter != '' and quarter != '1'.toString()
quarter != null and quarter != '' and quarter == '1'.toString()

select.if:
SELECT p.sjjjafpm FROM ( SELECT t.project_id, SUM( t.ygjjtwcjafbq ) / (t.yjgjtwcja1 + t.yjgjtwcja2 + t.yjgjtwcja3 + t.yjgjtwcja4) AS sjjjafbfb, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM( t.ygjjtwcjafbq )/ (t.yjgjtwcja1 + t.yjgjtwcja2 + t.yjgjtwcja3 + t.yjgjtwcja4) DESC) AS sjjjafpm FROM ( SELECT tb1.project_id, tb3.ygjjtwcjafbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.yjgjtwcja1,tb5.yjgjtwcja2, tb5.yjgjtwcja3,tb5.yjgjtwcja4, QUARTER ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y%m' ) ) AS jidu, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' AND (tb1.pro_process_id = '2' or tb1.pro_process_id = '3' or tb1.pro_process_id = '4') ) AS t
AND t.n = CAST(#{periodValue} AS SIGNED) - 1
AND t.jidu <= 4
AND t.period_value = CAST(#{periodValue} AS SIGNED) - 1
GROUP BY t.project_id HAVING sjjjafbfb IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sjjjafbfb DESC )AS p
and p.project_id = #{projectId}

if.test: quarter != null and quarter != '' and quarter != '1'.toString()

mapper.select:
SELECT
IFNULL((SELECT (SUM( t.tzwcbq ) * t.szgq / 100)/ ((IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc2,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc3,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc4,0) )* t.szgq / 100) FROM (SELECT tb1.project_id, tb1.project_short_name, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1,tb5.tzwc2,tb5.tzwc3,tb5.tzwc4, QUARTER ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y%m' ) ) AS jidu, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
and tb5.period_value = CAST(YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) AS SIGNED) - 1
WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' ) AS t
t.project_id = t3.project_id
AND t.n = CAST(YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m')) AS SIGNED) - 1
AND t.jidu <= 4
),0) AS bjqytzbfb,
IFNULL((SELECT SUM( t.tzwcbq )/ IFNULL(t.tzwcxj,0) FROM (SELECT tb1.project_id, tb1.project_short_name, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1 + tb5.tzwc2 + tb5.tzwc3 + tb5.tzwc4 AS tzwcxj, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
and tb5.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' ) AS t
t.project_id = t3.project_id
AND t.n = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
),0) AS snztzbfb,
IFNULL((SELECT (SUM( t.tzwcbq ) * t.szgq / 100)/ ((IFNULL(t.tzwc1,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc2,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc3,0) + IFNULL(t.tzwc4,0) )* t.szgq / 100) FROM (SELECT tb1.project_id, tb1.project_short_name, tb3.tzwcbq, tb4.szgq, tb5.tzwc1,tb5.tzwc2,tb5.tzwc3,tb5.tzwc4, QUARTER ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y%m' ) ) AS jidu, YEAR ( STR_TO_DATE( tb3.period_value, '%Y' ) ) AS n, tb5.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.project_id = tb1.project_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk tb3 ON tb3.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb3.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_com_inf tb4 ON tb4.inv_pro_id = tb2.id and tb4.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmndtzjh tb5 ON tb5.xmid = tb2.id and tb5.bbh = '2'
and tb5.period_value = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb1.project_type = '0' ) AS t
t.project_id = t3.project_id
AND t.n = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{periodValue},'%Y%m'))
AND t.jidu <= CAST(#{quarter} AS SIGNED) - 1
),0) AS bjqytzbfb,
t3.project_id FROM zj_tz_pro_manage t3
t3.del_flag = '0' AND t3.project_type = '0'
AND t3.project_id = #{projectId}
